stretches.title: Seated Spinal Twist
stretches.description: Sit up straight on your chair, place your feet on the ground and place your hands on the back of the chair. Using your arms, twist, pulling yourself toward the chair. Switch sides and repeat.

stretches.title: Neck Tilts
stretches.description: Keep shoulders relaxed and arms hanging loosely. Tilt head sideways, first on one side for 5 seconds, then the other for 5 seconds.

stretches.title: Cat/Cow Stretch
stretches.description: While sitting, inhale, arch your back and look up, pulling your shoulders back as you do so. When you exhale, round your spine, pull the shoulders toward each other at the front of the body and drop your head toward your chest.

stretches.title: Hand/Finger Stretch
stretches.description: Separate and then straighten your fingers. Hold for 10 seconds. Then bend fingers at knuckle and hold for 10 seconds. Separate and straighten again.
